findings.title: amountOutMin too low in swapExactTokensForTokens call
findings.description: The amountOutMin value set to 0 in uniV2Router.swapExactTokensForTokens call may result in very few bUSD tokens being withdrawn due to pool imbalance or manipulation, and can be mitigated by setting a higher value.

findings.title: Missing ensureUserActionDelay modifier
findings.description: The related TransmuterB.sol contract utilizes an ensureUserActionDelay modifier, which guards functions stake transmute , , and forceTransmute , and may mitigate unforeseen attacks such as flash loan attacks.

findings.title: Unchecked return values
findings.description: The following functions have return values that are not checked.

findings.title: Unlocked Pragma
findings.description: Every Solidity file specifies in the header a version number of the format pragma solidity (^)0.4.* . The caret ( ^ ) before the version number implies an unlocked pragma, meaning that the compiler will use the specified version and above , hence the term "unlocked".
